text:
Letter dated 14 July 2008 from the President of the
Security Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 10 July 2008 (S/2008/456) concerning your intention to designate Alexander Downer (Australia) as your Special Adviser on Cyprus has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the intention expressed in your letter.

(Signed) Le Luong Ming
President of the Security Council
